name: SYNTRAN® PUC 1311
description:
SYNTRAN® PUC 1311 is a cationic, semi-rigid PUD with excellent compatibility with inorganic additives and good adhesion to inorganic substrates and functional plastics such as polycarbonate. It also shows good adhesion to cold-rolled sheet. SYNTRAN® PUC 1311 is a self-emulsifying one-component system that shows no migration phenomena because it contains no surfactants.

Features and Benefits:


Good adhesion
High gloss
Excellent water, alkali and weather resistance
Excellent compatibility
Easy film forming at relatively low temperature
Good storage stability with good rheology.
One-component DMAC-based aliphatic polyurethane, low molecular weight, with inorganic additives, good flexibility on cold-rolled sheet
